channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 正確さを重視し、知識中心のプラットフォームとして際立っていたQuoraだが、今ではAIが生成した奇妙なエントリで埋め尽くされている（Nitish Pahwa/Slate）
item.description:
Nitish Pahwa / Slate:
A look at the decline of Quora, which used to stand out as an accuracy-focused, knowledge-centric platform but is now filled with bizarre, AI-generated entries  —  The site used to be a thriving community that worked to answer our most specific questions.  But users are fleeing.

item.title: 先週の決算では、メタの広告売上高が前年同期比24％増、アマゾンの広告事業が27％増、グーグルの広告事業が11％増と、広告市場好転の兆しが見られた（ジョナサン・バニアン/CNBC）。
item.description:
Jonathan Vanian / CNBC:
Last week's earnings showed signs of an ad market turnaround, with Meta's ad sales up 24% YoY, Amazon's ad business growing 27%, and Google's ad business up 11%  —  - The digital advertising market appears to be on the upswing based on quarterly results last week from Alphabet, Meta and Amazon.

item.title: ポリティコ、英総選挙を前に6人のロンドン・プレイブック・ニュースレター・チームを再編成、ポリティコの英国スタッフは2022年12月以来3倍に増加（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
Politico reshuffles its six-strong London Playbook newsletters team ahead of an expected UK general election; Politico's UK staff has grown 3x since Dec. 2022  —  Politico has more than tripled its London staffing since December 2022.  —  Politico has reshuffled the six-strong team writing …

item.title: ディアボーン市長は、ミシガン州の都市を "アメリカのジハードの首都 "と評したWSJのオピニオン記事の "直接の結果 "として、警察の存在感を高めたと語っている（Politico）。
item.description:
Politico:
Mayor of Dearborn says police increased their presence as a “direct result” of a WSJ opinion piece that described the Michigan city as “America's jihad capital”  —  The move is in response to a Wall Street Journal opinion piece.  —  DEARBORN, Mich. — Dearborn …

item.title: マイクロソフト、クレイグ・ニューマーク・ジャーナリズムスクール、オンラインニュース協会、GroundTruth Project、NotaとのAI提携を発表（Noreen Gillespie/Microsoft On the Issues）
item.description:
Noreen Gillespie / Microsoft On the Issues:
Microsoft announces AI partnerships with the Craig Newmark School of Journalism, the Online News Association, the GroundTruth Project, and Nota  —  What will the newsroom of the future look like?  —  Today, Microsoft is launching several collaborations with news organizations to adopt generative AI.

item.title: メモCNNが朝のスケジュールを見直し、ニュース・セントラルを午前7時（東部標準時）に繰り上げる。
item.description:
Lachlan Cartwright / The Hollywood Reporter:
Memo: CNN revamps its morning schedule, moving up News Central to 7am ET; This Morning moves to Atlanta, Phil Mattingly and Poppy Harlow will move to new roles  —  The show's 50-person team have been told they can reapply for jobs within the network, according to the people familiar.

item.title: ユーロビジョンの主催者である欧州放送連合が、公共放送の中継を補完する無料ストリーミングサービス「Eurovision Sport」を開始（K.J. Yossman/Variety）
item.description:
K.J. Yossman / Variety:
Eurovision organizer European Broadcasting Union launches Eurovision Sport, a free streaming service to complement public service broadcasters' coverage  —  A free direct-to-consumer service offering thousands of hours live sports broadcasting, the streamer is available for desktop, mobile and both ioS and Android apps.

item.title: BBC、ITV、Channel 4、Channel 5が支援する、ブロードバンドでライブTVを配信する無料ストリーミングサービスFreelyは、2024年第2四半期に開始予定（Naman Ramachandran/Variety）
item.description:
Naman Ramachandran / Variety:
Freely, a free streaming service backed by BBC, ITV, Channel 4, and Channel 5 that will deliver live TV over broadband, plans to launch in Q2 2024  —  Freely, the new free streaming service backed by Britain's public service broadcasters that will deliver live TV over broadband, will launch in the second quarter of 2024.

item.title: 英リーチ社、オンライン広告のターゲティングのための "文脈的 "ファーストパーティデータでアマゾンと契約。
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
UK-based Reach strikes a deal with Amazon for “contextual” first-party data to target online ads, as the media industry adapts to the end of third-party cookies  —  Media sector scrambles to deal with fallout from phase out of cross-website trackers

item.title: 情報源：英国は、著作権保護された素材を使用したAIモデルのトレーニングに関する規則を公表する計画を棚上げした。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources: the UK shelved plans to publish rules on the training of AI models using copyrighted material, after artists and tech groups failed to agree terms  —  Government-led talks stall as artists and tech groups fail to agree terms over access to copyrighted work

item.title: マイクロソフト、「シグナルズ」と呼ばれるニュース速報のためにセマフォーとAI契約を結ぶ。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Microsoft strikes an AI deal with Semafor for a breaking news feed called Signals; Ben Smith says it will be written by journalists, using AI as a research tool  —  Collaboration comes as tech giant faces multibillion-dollar lawsuit from the New York Times Microsoft is working with media start …

item.title: CondéNastはいかにしてPitchforkを買収し、そのクリエイティブ・チームを吸収し、プログラマティック広告販売の視聴者主導の条件に適合させようとしたのか（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
How Condé Nast bought and destroyed Pitchfork by absorbing its creative teams and trying to fit it into the audience-driven terms of programmatic ad sales  —  The News  —  In 2015, Condé Nast was nearing a deal to buy the music site Pitchfork, its first major editorial acquisition in years.

item.title: BBC、ITV、チャンネル4、チャンネル5が支援する、ブロードバンドでライブTVを配信する英国の無料ストリーミングサービス「Freely」は、2024年第2四半期に開始予定（Georg Szalai/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Georg Szalai / The Hollywood Reporter:
Freely, a free UK streaming service backed by the BBC, ITV, Channel 4, and Channel 5 that will deliver live TV over broadband, plans to launch in Q2 2024  —  With more than half of U.K. homes expecting to watch TV exclusively via broadband by 2030, it “will bring live and on-demand content together …

item.title: UMGのTikTok撤退、低報酬やディープフェイク対策に関する保証の欠如などの問題に端を発し、音楽業界におけるTikTokの役割（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
A look at UMG's TikTok retreat, stemming from issues like low payouts and a lack of assurances on fighting deepfakes, and TikTok's role in the music industry  —  We're about to find out how important TikTok is to the music industry.  —  Happy Grammy Sunday to those of you who celebrate.

item.title: Skydanceとシャリー・レッドストーンのNational Amusementsの取引の可能性について。
item.description:
Financial Times:
A look at the potential deal between Skydance and Shari Redstone's National Amusements, as a tough media industry landscape forces Redstone to consider offers  —  Interest from Skydance and other bidders could split shareholders in studio behind ‘The Godfather’
